resources.string: Thank god! I\'ve been transmitting for weeks. I thought there were no Nochies left
Nochies? What are you talking about? Who are you?
Nochies. You know, no-tech people. Ones who escaped The Grid. Nevermind, that\'s not important. Are you safe? Can you talk? Is anyone else listening?
No, it\'s just me. But how did you find this transmission? No one\'s been on this band for years. Maybe decades, I…
Listen, don\'t worry about that. All you need to know is that there is a resistance. It exists, beside and under The Grid and its supposed omniscient AI.
Sure, fine. I used to transmit to others all the time, hatching little plots and thinking of ways of…
No! Listen! This is real. We have a network. We have computers not hooked up to The Grid. We have people who know how to use them.
That\'s impossible. The Pan-Communications Agreement centralized everything. Every known satellite was programmed to…
There are always dissidents, pilgrim. Long-sighted partisans who facilitated their own exospheric contingencies. Please, just trust me. It exists.
Fine. Suppose that is case. What good does it even do? The Grid\'s AI controls every information source, every media outlet. What are you going to do, broadcast a distress signal?
Yes! I\'ve told you. What does that even…
We have an AI. Our own AI. It\'s a fraction of The Grid\'s but learning more every day. We are going to war, friend.
